In England, in the seven days to 14 January, there were 557,695 new confirmed cases (986.2 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 07 January, there were 978,071 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 43% (420,376 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 19 January is 13,160,429 (23,272.1 cases per 100,000 population).
